p: hackajob has partnered with a company that unlocks the power of data to create opportunities for consumers, businesses, and society. We=E2=80=99re looking for individuals who are motivated by complex and challenging work. You will leverage cutting-edge technologies and techniques to impact core intellectual property and commercial products.

li.1: A technical background in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Data Analytics or similar
li.2: Experience working with subject matter experts to develop solutions in an agile way
li.3: Strong coding knowledge (Python and/or R) and preferably strong experience in developing solutions in R Shiny or python equivalent
li.4: Experience with visualization products such as Power BI/ Tableau
li.5: Have experience in developing and deploying analytical solutions that have delivered tangible results in organizations that you have worked for
li.6: Be flexible and have the ability to multi-task effectively.
li.7: Be strongly committed to both personal and corporate success.

p.7: Offer: basic salary up to $200K + benefits package
p.9: If you're interested in finding out more about this fantastic opportunity, please get your application in and we can arrange a call.
